root.name: Jack Lumber: The Lumberjack
root.description: OverviewJack Lumber is an iOS game developed by indie studio Owlchemy Labs and published by Sega. The object of the game is for players to slide their finger on the screen to chop logs in the quickest time and to combine the log chopping for extra points.Released Aug. 16, 2012 on iOS for $1.99.
